high_descs: Walk to the laptop on the sofa in front of you.
Pick up the laptop from the sofa.
Walk slightly to the left to the front of the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a laptop by the light of a desk lamp.

high_descs: Turn to the left, and then face the couch on the right.
Close the laptop and pick it up off of the couch.
Carry the laptop a few steps to the left to find the table in the corner.
Hold the laptop and turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Carry a laptop to turn on a lamp.

high_descs: Turn left, walk towards the wall, turn right, walk to the couch.
Pick up the laptop from the couch turn left, walk towards the wall, turn right.
Turn the on the light on the end table.
anns.task_desc: Pick up the laptop and turn on the light on the end table.
